column4: This test case aims to verify whether the OrangeHRM system allows users to enter numeric values in the First Name, Middle Name, or Last Name fields when adding a new employee. 1. The OrangeHRM demo website is up and running. 
2. A stable internet connection is available.
3. The user is successfully logged into the system using the Admin credentials provided in the demo environment.
column6:
1. Open a web browser (e.g., Microsoft Edge).
2. Navigate to the OrangeHRM demo website using the URL: https://opensource-demo.orangehrmlive.com/
3. Log in using the demo Admin credentials: Username: Admin, Password: admin123
4. After successful login, from the top menu, click on the PIM tab.
